price: फिर जब सूर (नरसिंघा) में एक फूँक मारी जाएगी।
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
